'''1.18.2 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.18.2-rc1''' in the launcher) is the first and only release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.18.2]], released on February 25, 2022,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-18-2-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.18.2 Release Candidate 1|February 25, 2022}}</ref> which fixes bugs. This is the first release candidate released in 2022.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.18.2 Release Candidate 1
|;From released versions before 1.18
|188086|Decorations and amethyst geodes get cut off on full chunk boundaries upon relog.
|;From 1.18
|244682|Some custom dimensions settings can cause the server to stop running, but not crash.
|;dev
|248764|Some worldgen datapacks can kill the internal server (possibly related to density functions).
}}</onlyinclude>
